description.value:
A thief’s hands are trained in delicate procedures, a natural quickness that allows for sneaky operations. As thieves act throughout the day, their mental and physical acuity is drained, until they inevitably botch an attempt. Thieves sometimes call these “Thief Fingers” or simply Fingers (with a capital F), referring to how many more tricks the thief can pull off before failing.

You have 5 “Fingers” (regardless of how many fingers you have) which represent the deftness of your most thieving faculties. They can be spent to take certain Thief actions.

Fingers are regained at the end of a rest.
